akn:section.akn:heading: Standards and best practices for use of non-invasive and non-permanent tracking devices

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Applicability of standards and best practices

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Applicability of standards and best practices The standards and best practices established by the Attorney General under subsection (a) shall apply only to the grant programs authorized under subsection (a)(2) of section 12621 of this title, as added by this Act.
